This folder contains 6 items:

van velzen et al within-host competition coexistence.doc is the manuscript version submitted to American Naturalist,
"The role of within-host competition in coexistence in multiparasitoid-host systems", Ellen van Velzen, Saleta Pérez-Vila, Rampal S. Etienne

"simulation code" contains the c++ simulation code.

"mathematica files" contains the mathematica files with the numerical stability analysis

"textfiles" contains the text files used to generate the final figures (subdivided into "stability plots", generated by the stability analysis, and "coexistence plots" using simulation results)

"coexistenceplots.R" is the R file containing the scripts used to generate the coexistence plots

"stabilityplots.R" is the R file containing the scripts used to generate the stability plots
